verses.verse: And they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6430>Behold<s%>, the Philistines are <S%H3898>fighting<s%> against <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, and are <S%H8154>robbing<s%> the <S%H1637>threshing-floors<s%>.

Therefore <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Shall I <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> these <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>? And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3373>him<s%>, Behold, we are afraid here in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: how much more then if we <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> against the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>?

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%>. And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6030>him<s%>, and said, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>; for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and brought <S%H5090>away<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, and <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>. So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>.

And it came to <S%H54>pass<s%>, when Abiathar the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, that he came <S%H3381>down<s%> with an <S%H646>ephod<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5234>delivered<s%> him into my <S%H3027>hand<s%>; for he is shut <S%H5462>in<s%>, by <S%H935>entering<s%> into a <S%H5892>town<s%> that hath <S%H1817>gates<s%> and <S%H1280>bars<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>summoned<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>to<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%>, to go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, to <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H2790>devising<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> against <S%H559>him<s%>; and he said to <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, Bring <S%H5066>hither<s%> the <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H8085>surely<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the city for my <S%H5892>sake<s%>.

Will the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> deliver me <S%H5462>up<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>? will <S%H7586>Saul<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%>, as thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H8085>heard<s%>? O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, I beseech <S%H5046>thee<s%>, tell thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>. And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, He will come <S%H3381>down<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, Will the <S%H1167>men<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> <S%H5462>deliver<s%> up to me and my <S%H582>men<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>? And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, They will deliver thee <S%H5462>up<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%>, who were about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>, <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>, and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H834>whithersoever<s%> they could <S%H1980>go<s%>. And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H4422>escaped<s%> from <S%H7084>Keilah<s%>; and he <S%H2308>forbare<s%> to go <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%>, and <S%H3427>remained<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> him every <S%H3117>day<s%>, but <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him not into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> was in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> in the <S%H2793>wood<s%>.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>, <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> into the <S%H2793>wood<s%>, and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in <S%H430>God<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3372>him<s%>, Fear <S%H3027>not<s%>; for the hand of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H4427>thee<s%>; and thou shalt be king over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and I shall be <S%H4932>next<s%> unto <S%H7586>thee<s%>; and that also Saul my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%>.

And they <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H2793>wood<s%>, and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Then came <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H2130>Ziphites<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Doth not <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5641>hide<s%> himself with us in the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> in the <S%H2793>wood<s%>, in the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H2444>Hachilah<s%>, which is on the <S%H3225>south<s%> of the <S%H3452>desert<s%>?

Now <S%H4428>therefore<s%>, O king, come <S%H3381>down<s%>, according to all the <S%H185>desire<s%> of thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%>; and our part shall be to <S%H5462>deliver<s%> him up into the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be ye of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for ye have had compassion on <S%H2550>me<s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%>, I pray <S%H3559>you<s%>, make yet more <S%H3045>sure<s%>, and know and <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H4725>place<s%> where his <S%H7272>haunt<s%> <S%H7200>is<s%>, and who hath seen him <S%H559>there<s%>; for it is told me that he dealeth <S%H6191>very<s%> <S%H6191>subtly<s%>.

See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H3045>therefore<s%>, and take knowledge of all the <S%H4224>lurking-places<s%> where he <S%H2244>hideth<s%> <S%H7725>himself<s%>, and come ye again to me of a <S%H3559>certainty<s%>, and I will <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H3426>you<s%>: and it shall come to pass, if he be in the <S%H776>land<s%>, that I will <S%H2664>search<s%> him out among all the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And they <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H2128>Ziph<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>: but <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> were in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon<s%>, in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> on the <S%H3225>south<s%> of the <S%H3452>desert<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H5046>him<s%>. And they told <S%H1732>David<s%>: wherefore he came <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon<s%>. And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7291>that<s%>, he pursued <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H4584>Maon<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> on this <S%H6654>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> on that <S%H6654>side<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> made <S%H2648>haste<s%> to get <S%H3212>away<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>; for <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5849>compassed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> round <S%H5849>about<s%> to take <S%H8610>them<s%>.

But there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H4116>Haste<s%> <S%H3212>thee<s%>, and come; for the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have made a <S%H6584>raid<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%>.

So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: therefore they <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5555>Sela-hammahlekoth<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H3427>thence<s%>, and dwelt in the <S%H4679>strongholds<s%> of <S%H5872>En-gedi<s%>.
